definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: No more lives will be consumed by your hatred.
sentences.chinese: 你的憎恨將不再貽害更多生靈。

sentences.english: In the event you read one bad book, it can bring unending trouble.
sentences.chinese: 萬一讀到一本壞書，那就將貽害無窮了。

sentences.english: An extravagant habit may produce a lasting and disastrous impact on one's life.
sentences.chinese: 養成浪費的習慣對一個人的一生影響貽害無窮。

sentences.english: We should attach more importance to "administrative rickets" because it is greatly harmful for our society.
sentences.chinese: “行政軟骨病”貽害無窮，我們要引起足夠的重視。

sentences.english: Getting into the bad habit of gambling will bring continuous evil consequences.
sentences.chinese: 染上賭博的惡習將貽害無窮。
